name: Ice Scream Meltdown
description:
The freezer is busted so sell as much ice cream as you can, before it all melts in the summer heat. Make it all count!  ; D

Interact with people to sell ice cream and collect as much dosh you see laying around the coast.

Controls

Move - WASD
Camera - Mouse Axis 
Interact - Left Click (sell ice cream)
Jump - Spacebar
Sprint - Left Shift

Xbox Gamepad (Press Left Start for Splitscreen Multiplayer)

Move - Left Stick
Camera - Right Stick
Interact - A button
Jump - Y button
Sprint - Right Trigger
